ygData.subject: Re: At the Stunticons Starcruiser
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay shouts Motormaster, he then turns to Wildrider and Dragstrip and starts to whisper follow them. He orders. and do what Wildrider says practically

Subject: Re: At the Stunticons Starcruiser
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

"Okay" shouts Motormaster, he then turns to Wildrider and Dragstrip and
starts to whisper "follow them." He orders. "and do what" Wildrider says
practically drooling "paste some big bots" he shouts almost to loud. "No,
youre just supposed to spy moron" says Motormaster. He turns to Astrotrain
"Be careful, I dont trust anything organic" he says as he points almost
accusingly at the large robots in front of them.
